back_cards.example_en: The gene for blue eyes was passed down.
Scientists studied the gene’s function.
The gene mutation caused the disorder.
This gene helps plants survive drought.
The gene was sequenced in the lab.
The package arrived at her doorstep.

back_cards.definition_en: A set of items bundled together
back_cards.example_en: The software package included tutorials.
The vacation package was affordable.
The package was labeled fragile.
The job came with a great package.
The weird noise kept her awake.
He wore a weird hat to the party.
The forest had a weird atmosphere.
Her weird behavior worried her friends.
The movie had a weird but fun plot.

back_cards.definition_en: A state of being hard to do
back_cards.example_en: She faced difficulty solving the puzzle.
The team overcame the difficulty together.
He had difficulty finding a job.
The game’s difficulty increased each level.
The difficulty arose during negotiations.
She hardly slept before the exam.
He hardly noticed the time passing.
It hardly seems fair to cancel now.
They hardly had enough food left.
I hardly think she’ll agree.
Her daddy read her a bedtime story.

back_cards.definition_en: A familiar address for a dad
back_cards.example_en: Daddy, can we go to the park?

back_cards.definition_en: A figure of care or protection
back_cards.example_en: He’s been a daddy to her since birth.
The toddler called for her daddy.
She made a card for her daddy.
The estimate for repairs was high.
Her estimate of the crowd was accurate.
The contractor gave a detailed estimate.
The estimate of damages was ongoing.
The estimate suggested a quick recovery.
The digital era changed communication.
Her reign marked a peaceful era.
The era of exploration began in the 1400s.
The jazz era was vibrant and lively.
Dinosaurs lived in the Mesozoic era.
The aid arrived for the flood victims.
Financial aid helped her attend college.
The hearing aid improved his life.
The organization sent aid to the region.
First aid was given at the scene.
The game was Team A vs Team B.
The debate was freedom vs security.
She chose books vs movies.
The case was Smith vs Jones.
The match was cats vs dogs in popularity.
She invested in the new startup.
He invested hours in his training.
They invested in renewable energy.
The leader was invested with power.
She invested her energy in the cause.
I personally thanked her for the help.
Personally, I prefer tea over coffee.
She personally delivered the package.
Personally, he found the movie boring.
He personally oversaw the project.
Her notion of success was unique.
He had a notion that it would rain.
I have no notion of what happened.
She followed a sudden notion to travel.
The notion struck her during the meeting.
His explanation of the rule was clear.
The teacher’s explanation helped the class.
She offered an explanation for her delay.
The manual included an explanation of setup.
The data needed further explanation.
The airport was crowded with travelers.
She arrived at the international airport.
The airport had a new terminal.
The airport offered shuttle services.
His flight left from the airport at noon.

back_cards.definition_en: A series of linked metal rings
back_cards.example_en: The gate was secured with a chain.
The chain of events led to success.
The restaurant is part of a chain.
The prisoner broke his chain.
The supply chain was efficient.
The report exposed the company’s flaws.
The storm exposed the roof to damage.
She exposed her artwork at the gallery.
He was exposed to new ideas.
The journalist exposed the scandal.
The door had a sturdy lock.
She turned the lock to enter.
The wheels were in a lock.
He escaped the opponent’s lock.
The boat passed through the lock.
She convinced him to join the team.
He convinced her the plan would work.
They convinced the board to approve.
Her skills convinced the employer.
I’m convinced we should try this.
She switched to her favorite channel.
The ship sailed through the channel.
The message came through official channels.
The channel guided water to the fields.
His channel has thousands of followers.
She carefully crossed the icy street.
He carefully reviewed the contract.
The artist carefully painted the details.
She carefully chose her words.
They carefully planned the event.

back_cards.definition_en: A drop of liquid from the eye
back_cards.example_en: A tear rolled down her cheek.
The tear in her shirt was noticeable.
She shed a tear during the movie.
His eyes were full of tears.
The tear in the fabric was repaired.
The estate included a mansion.
Her estate was divided among heirs.
They bought a home in the estate.
The clergy were an estate in society.
The wine estate produced fine reds.
The initial meeting set the tone.
Her initial reaction was surprise.
The initial phase was challenging.
The initial plan needed adjustments.
Initial results were promising.
Her purchase included a new phone.
The car was a major purchase.
The purchase was made online.
The purchase required a loan.
His purchase arrived in a week.
The guide showed them the ruins.
The guide explained the software.
The map was her guide in the city.
Honesty was his guide in life.
The teacher was a guide for students.
They went forth to explore the forest.
She brought forth her best ideas.
The river flowed forth from the mountains.
The plan was set forth clearly.
He ventured forth on his journey.
Their bond grew over years.
She invested in government bonds.
The bond between siblings was unbreakable.
The contract was a binding bond.
The molecule’s bond was stable.
Her birthday was celebrated with cake.
His tenth birthday was a big event.
She planned a trip for her birthday.
The birthday included a surprise party.
His birthday made him officially an adult.
She prayed for peace every night.
He prayed for a quick recovery.
They prayed before the meal.
The community prayed during the crisis.
She prayed at the temple daily.
The improvement in sales was noticeable.
Her health showed great improvement.
The software needed improvement.
The renovation was an improvement.
The team saw improvement in teamwork.

back_cards.definition_en: Very old or from long ago
back_cards.example_en: The ancient ruins attracted tourists.
She studied ancient Greek literature.
His ancient phone barely worked.
The ancient artifact was priceless.
The ancient tree stood tall.
You ought to apologize for that.
We ought to leave before dark.
It ought to be ready by now.
She ought to help her neighbor.
They ought to follow the rules.
The prisoner escaped from jail.
She escaped the boring meeting.
They escaped the burning building.
His name escaped her for a moment.
He escaped to the countryside.
The trail led through the forest.

back_cards.definition_en: A mark or sign left behind
back_cards.example_en: The comet left a bright trail.
The trail was popular with campers.
A trail of clues solved the mystery.
The boat left a trail in the water.
She wore a brown coat in fall.
His skin was brown from the sun.
The brown leaves covered the ground.
The meat was perfectly brown.
The room had brown wooden floors.
Her fashion sense was impeccable.
He worked in high fashion.
She spoke in a confident fashion.
The fashion of the era was unique.
The design reflected modern fashion.
The length of the room was 20 feet.
The movie’s length was two hours.
She cut a length of rope.
He explained it at length.
The pool’s length was perfect for laps.
She put a clean sheet on the bed.
A sheet of ice formed overnight.
He wrote on a sheet of paper.
A sheet of rain soaked the field.
The spreadsheet was on one sheet.
The project received government funding.
Funding for the school was increased.
The startup sought private funding.
Her research depended on funding.
The charity struggled with funding.
She cooked dinner; meanwhile, he set the table.
The team prepared; meanwhile, the storm approached.
He studied; meanwhile, she worked.
The meeting dragged on; meanwhile, lunch waited.
They hiked; meanwhile, the sun set.
The accident was nobody’s fault.
The machine had a mechanical fault.
She took the fault for the mix-up.
The earthquake occurred along a fault.
He found fault with the plan.
She barely finished the race in time.
He barely spoke during the meeting.
They barely escaped the storm.
The room was barely lit.
She barely had enough money.

back_cards.definition_en: To remove or get rid of
back_cards.example_en: They eliminated errors from the report.
She eliminated two options quickly.
The team was eliminated in the finals.
The plan aimed to eliminate waste.
He eliminated distractions to focus.
The motion of the waves was calming.
She made a motion to sit down.
The motion was passed in the meeting.
The project was in motion.
The car’s motion was smooth.
Water is essential for survival.
Her role was essential to the team.
The book covers essential concepts.
His advice was essential for success.
Trust is an essential part of friendship.
The houses were miles apart.
The toy fell apart when dropped.
She stood apart from the group.
Their views were worlds apart.
They grew apart over the years.
The combination of flavors was delicious.
Her outfit was a combination of styles.
The safe’s combination was secret.
The combination of talents won the award.
The combination worked perfectly.
The event had limited seating.
Her knowledge was limited on the topic.
The offer was for a limited time.
Resources were limited during the crisis.
The company had limited growth.
Her description of the scene was vivid.
The description took several minutes.
The job posting included a description.
People of every description attended.
His description matched the suspect.
